revised_title: The Influence of Natural Selection on Variability and Correlation of Organs
tldr: This article explores the impact of natural selection on the variability and correlation of organs in local populations. The author demonstrates that natural selection influences the correlation between organs and is likely the primary factor in the production of correlation. The study uses mathematical formulas and statistical methods to analyze the effects of selection on the correlation and variability of organs in different populations.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolutionary Biology
